thread.title: Sturgeon 'to make MAJOR announcement' as SNP gloat they'll WIN second indy referendum
thread.title_full: Sturgeon 'to make MAJOR announcement' as SNP gloat they'll WIN second indy referendum

title: Sturgeon 'to make MAJOR announcement' as SNP gloat they'll WIN second indy referendum
text:
Sturgeon 'to make MAJOR announcement' as SNP gloat they'll WIN second indy referendum Sturgeon 'to make MAJOR announcement' as SNP gloat they'll WIN second indy referendum SCOTLAND could be set for a second independence referendum as early as August next year as rumours grow First Minister Nicola Sturgeon is set to make a major announcement. PUBLISHED: 22:02,  08, Wed, Feb 8, 2017 GETTY Nicola Sturgeon may soon announce a date for a second Scottish independence referendum 
Sources within Scotland, both in the SNP administration and in the country’s opposition Tory party, indicated the likelihood of another vote was growing by the day. 
Prime Minister Theresa May is believed to already be working on a contingency plan amid fears demand for another vote could be impossible to ignore in just a matter of months. 
A senior Scottish Tory insider said: “We need to be prepared. Listening to what they (the SNP) have been saying in the past few days the timing could be even faster than August. This is about making sure we are calm and collected ahead of any negotiations.” Related articles
